name: Total Derby + Zombies
description:
The engines are roaring, and you don’t even have time to put on your seat belt before it’s time to go! Your objective... wreak as much enemies as possible.
Total Derby+Zombies is adrenaline-filled muscle car racing game with damage,realistic physics and beautiful graphics, innovative game play mechanics and good fun!


Features:
- Car racing game with damage effect
- Highly muscle & sport cars
- AI smart technology
- Real car's physics
- Beautiful graphics

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames
